author: Reuters Editorial
title: China March industrial output falls 1.1% year-on-year, better than forecast; first-quarter investment slides 16.1%
description: China's industrial output fell a less steeper-than-expected 1.1% in March from a year earlier, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Friday, as the coronavirus crisis and strict containment measures severely disrupted the world's second-larges…
content: BEIJING (Reuters) - China’s industrial output fell a less steeper-than-expected 1.1% in March from a year earlier, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Friday, as the coronavirus crisis and strict containment measures severely disrupted the w… [+1121 chars]
